name: Rummy 3D Premium
detailed_description:
Realistic 3D Rummy simulation with singleplayer, multiplayer and tutorial. With configurable AI strength and many adjustable rule and game variants you can start exciting Rummy tournaments - or just play for fun.

Compete with tricky computer opponents, or play relaxing rounds with friends or family in online mode!

Game environment, cards, rule variants and much more can be customized! For beginners, there is an animated step-by-step tutorial in which the Rummy game is explained with all the rules.

Features:

  • Singleplayer mode with configurable opponents
  • Many rule variations with to 6 players
  • Multiplayer mode with LAN or Online mode
  • High Quality full animated 3D graphics
  • Lots of tables, rooms and decks
  • High-performance A.I.: different levels of difficulty
  • Voice output and sound
  • Highscore lists
  • HD widescreen output
  • Tutorial, detailed game instructions and help
